title: Long Awaited Season
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Though it’s still cold, The things that shops are selling are all spring stuff huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s warm inside the shops, so you start to want spring stuff….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, it seems like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, this earring is cute….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wah, it really is!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>There are lots of small flowers. Looks like it’ll fit Hanayo-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh!? Is-, is that so? Ah, but this color also fits Rina-chan. Look…. Yeah! It’s Cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Totally! Hey, how about we buy matching pairs?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Matching pairs, I’ll be happy. Rina-chan’s board 「Embarassed」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
